_comments.setup: Replace YOUR_WOOCOMMERCE_CONSUMER_KEY and YOUR_WOOCOMMERCE_CONSUMER_SECRET with your actual WooCommerce API credentials
_comments.storeUrl: Replace with your actual WooCommerce store URL (including https://)
_comments.oneSignal: Replace YOUR_ONESIGNAL_APP_ID with your OneSignal App ID for push notifications
_comments.colors: primaryColor and secondaryColor support hex color codes
_comments.currencies: defaultCurrency supports any ISO currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, SAR, etc.)
_comments.languages: supportedLanguages array determines which languages appear in the language selector
_comments.paymentGateways: enabledPaymentGateways controls which payment options are available
_comments.demo: Set useDemoData to true for testing without a real WooCommerce store
